description: This PHP script handles AJAX requests to configure wireless network settings, including basic configuration, advanced settings, WPS setup, enabling/disabling radio, client pairing, MAC filtering, and saving configurations. It provides mechanisms to apply changes to a device via setStr calls and retrieves device state with getStr calls.

methods.name: MiniApplySSID
methods.description: Applies configuration to a specific SSID by setting appropriate device parameters.

methods.name: ajaxSet_wireless_network_configuration
methods.description: Main handler that processes incoming configuration requests and executes corresponding device setting commands.
